forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 42, with temperatures rising to around 44 overnight. North northwest wind 5 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. North wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
In the embrace of evening, Downtown San Francisco is finding solace in clarity. The sky stretches above in an expansive dark canvas, unbroken and serene, a reminder of the ethereal beauty that unfolds when fog remains at bay. As the temperature drifts down to a comfortable chill, the local breeze carries a whisper of the North, a delicate touch that adds an invigorating note to the air. For those venturing out tonight, light layers will do wonders; perhaps a cozy jacket over a simple sweater, allowing the vibrant pulse of the city to be enjoyed without shivering against the coolness.

Sunday promises to unveil its own charm, bright and welcoming with sunlight spilling over the iconic landscape. As temperatures rise gently, a pleasant warmth will crest, allowing for leisurely strolls through the streets or quiet moments at a café where one can watch the city bustle. The afternoon may hint at a slight drop, cloaking the day in a soothing embrace. With a clear sky overhead, the day beckons for exploration—whether wandering through parks or discovering hidden corners of the vibrant neighborhoods. The mellowness of the moment offers a perfect backdrop for simple pleasures, away from the hustle, inviting all to breathe deeply of the fresh air and enjoy the beautiful mix of city life and tranquility.
